name: KING QUEEN
description: WhatsAsena project - Makes it easy and fun to use Whatsapp. World’s first UserBot made for WhatsApp.

ASENA_SESSION.description: Type here yours KING_QUEEN Session.QR කෝඩය ස්කෑන් කර ලබා ගන්නා කේතය ඇතුලත් කරන්න

SUDO.description: Leave blank if you don't know how to use it! Sudo mode; Your number must be an international number. So you should have your number after the country code. Example: 1205xxxxxxxxx (USA number +1)

LANGUAGE.description: Bot language.English => en, භාශාව තේරීම සදහා

SEND_READ.description: Write true if you want to throw seen.

HEROKU.description: If it is running in Heroku, type true.

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Mute Message! Use => default, to change back.
MUTE_MESSAGE.value: *server is updating so the group will be muted* ~TOXIC 4L!3N

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unmute Message! Use => default, to change back.
UNMUTE_MESSAGE.value: the server has been updated now we can talk ~TOXIC 4L!3N

WORK_TYPE.description: WhatsAsena Working Type. If you use “public”, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use “private”, only you can use your bot.

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Alive Message! Use => default, to change back.

BAN_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Ban Message! Use => default, to change back.
BAN_MESSAGE.value: this group will never open for you

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Kickme Message! Use => default, to change back.
KICKME_MESSAGE.value: ok guys my days are over so, I am leaving. bye

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Promote Message! Use => default, to change back.
PROMOTE_MESSAGE.value: i am giving you the responsibility

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Demote Message! Use => default, to change back.
DEMOTE_MESSAGE.value: you are not worthy enough to rule this group

AFK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable AFK Message! Use => default, to change back.

GAN_IMAGE.description: Type image link for Gan Style plugin.

NO_ONLINE.description: Type true if you don't want to appear online.

COFFEEHOUSE_API_KEY.description: CoffeeHouse API Key. Need for Lydia. https://coffeehouse.intellivoid.net/
